title: The Pinnacle of Alpine Luxury
description: Check into Corniche Hirafu, a dreamy chalet in the woods just a stone’s throw away from the action in Hirafu. This grand 580 sqm chalet marries alpine luxury with generous spaces. Enjoy marvellous mountain views from the living and dining areas, which have soaring 6m-high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows. Located in the heart of Hirafu’s famed Millionaires’ Row, this is the first house to be constructed on the high-end estate. Guests get to enjoy the privacy of the neighbourhood, while being near the gondola, ski lift, as well as restaurants and bars in Hirafu’s Middle Village. Made for the wellness lover, the chalet features a natural hot spring well that flows into a private hot spring, as well as a sauna, plunge pool and stylish sky terraces.
address: 165-41, Niseko Hirafu 2 Jo 1 Chome, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-Gun, Hokkaido 044-0089

title: Luxury living that combines spectacular natural vistas with all conveniences
description: Nestled in a tranquil forest overlooking the magnificent Mount Yotei, Intuition comprises a six-story building of residences, dining and onsen. Intuition combines spectacular natural vistas with exceptional location adjacent to the village center, just steps away from ski lift, dining and shopping. While close to all the village amenities, Intuition is uniquely nestled in a natural forest setting. The estate is designed to preserve the serene nature of the exclusive location away from the crowd, allowing our guests to enjoy a peaceful moment during their holiday getaway. A full range of luxury amenities is paired with seamless services by our dedicated team to make your stay unforgettable.
address: 38-6 Kabayama, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0078

title: Award-winning 530 sqm chalet near Hanazono Resort
description: Experience the epitome of alpine elegance at Tsubasa Chalet, an award-winning chalet situated within the exclusive Hanaridge Estate in Hanazono—the 530 sqm property has been named Japan’s Best Ski Chalet 2024 at the World Ski Awards. Managed by a dedicated team, including a concierge, every aspect of your stay at Tsubasa Chalet is overseen with meticulous attention to detail, setting the stage for your perfect winter getaway. More than just a beautiful setting, the property offers the luxurious convenience of having up to two drivers, both in the morning and evening during your stay. Wellness is also paramount here, with amenities including a 40 sqm private natural onsen with indoor and outdoor pools, a modern gym and a yoga studio.
address: 267-15 Iwaobetsu, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0082

title: Sansui Niseko
description: The SANSUI NISEKO one-bedroom apartment features a generous living area, a full kitchen and a separate bedroom.
address: 5-32, 1 Jo 4 Chome, Niseko Hirafu, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0080

title: Niseko’s Secret Sweetheart
description: Disconnect from the modern world, surround yourself with loved ones and recharge your batteries tucked away in the peace and serenity of Hokkaido’s winter wonderland, Niseko. The Song Saa private chalet is the perfect getaway for those looking for a cozy retreat to catch a break. Featuring six large bedrooms spread over two floors and a modern, open plan kitchen and living area, Song Saa chalet will bring your group together. The quiet chalet has views of the picturesque, Japanese mountain range from all angles, with luxurious furnishing throughout. Take a break in the traditional Tatami room which is an excellent way to have an authentic Japanese experience.
address: 432-47 Niseko, Niseko-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 048-1511

title: Ski-in ski-out luxury.
description: The Maples Niseko is one of Niseko's most popular ski-in ski-out hotels offers 73 units, ranging from studio, 2 bedroom, 3 bedroom & penthouses. The thoughtful design ensures this property focuses on large, livable spaces and functional kitchens. The amenities in Maples are centered around the needs of residents, with a ski room and cafe with direct access to the Family ski run to provide ski in / ski out perfection. The Maples offers a complete immersion into the good life that is synonymous with Niseko.
address: 5-41 Niseko Hirafu 1-jo 4-chome, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0080

title: Villa Benyasiri
description:
Perched at the highest point of the island, Villa Benyasiri offers breathtaking views of Naka Lay Bay and the expansive Andaman Sea.

This contemporary-style villa features spacious bedrooms and common areas designed for maximum comfort. A luxury-inspired infinity pool and exclusive outdoor spaces provide an idyllic setting for a leisurely getaway. The minimalist interior is enhanced with exotic Asian artwork, creating a perfect blend of elegance and culture.

Relax on your private terrace while admiring the ocean or indulge in a luxurious bath in a serene sanctuary. Villa Benyasiri is the ideal retreat for families, friends, or couples seeking a peaceful and stylish escape.
address: Villa Benyasiri, Phuket, Kathu District, Phuket, Thailand

title: Kita Kitsune Chalet - hirafu niseko japan
description: With its spectacular views of Mount Yotei, striking concrete façade and stylish interior design, the four-bedroom luxury  Kita Kitsune Chalet is a wonderfully chic home to return to after spending a day in the great outdoors. Located in the village of Hirafu with its laid-back vibes and flourishing après-ski scene, Kita Kitsune Chalet is only minutes away from some of the world’s best ‘champagne snow-powder’ and numerous hiking trails. Overlooking a spacious outside terrace – perfect for alfresco dining – Kita Kitsune Chalet’s living areas have been beautifully appointed with modern minimalist furniture, a swanky, decorative, decorative hanging fireplace, and splashes of colour adding a lively playfulness to an otherwise sleek and polished interior. With snowy white mountains in the background – or lush green woods, depending on the time of the year – the chalet’s lounge area provides an elegant space for catching up on each other’s daily hiking, skiing or golf adventures. Kita Kitsune Chalet has two comfortable master bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, as well as two guest bedrooms that share a separate bathroom. The modern open-plan kitchen with its large worktop offers a welcome invitation to prepare a meal from scratch. You won’t need to worry about cooking however, given the chalet’s close proximity to some of Hirafu’s best eateries. Thanks to its excellent location, swanky interior, and exceptional amenities, this chalet is an excellent choice for a family or a group of friends looking to explore Hirafu in luxury and style.
address: Hirafu village, Niseko, Japan.

title: momiji lodge chalet - hirafu niseko japan
description: Fabulously located right in the middle of Niseko’s buzzing Hirafu Village, four-bedroom Momiji Lodge sets the scene for quintessential luxury ski vacations, and memorable year-round mountain escapes. Three stylish levels accommodate up to 10 people and provide ample space for extended families and groups of friends to spread out in absolute comfort.An original chalet lovingly restored to its former glory, Momiji maintains its authentic mountain character, but is resplendent with modern luxuries. Think heated floors, double glazing, flat-screen TVs and bedrooms with individually controlled heating. The lodge was one of the first accommodation houses built in Hirafu but was immaculately refurbished in 2012, retaining its characteristic features such as wooden floors, original skylights and a Japanese bath, while updating it with classy modern touches and facilities. The result is a sophisticated holiday home where sunlight pours through the windows and skylights of the open-plan living area. The chalet also has its own large, indoor onsen-style granite bath, ideal for soaking weary bones after a day in the mountains, while those looking to experience the outdoor volcanic hot springs that Niseko is famous for, will find plenty to choose from nearby. Two master bedrooms provide loft-style living, while a bunk room and queen-sized guest room are equally suited for adults or children. The well-equipped kitchen encourages self-catering, but with some of Hirafu’s best restaurants and bars just a stroll away (many reached via heated pavements, so there is no need to worry about sliding on ice), you might be happy not to bother. You can also order gourmet meals through Niseko Gourmet and enjoy exceptional dining experiences in your own chalet.
address: Middle Village Hirafu, Niseko, Japan.

title: aoyama lodge chalet - kabayama niseko japan
description: Aoyama Lodge is situated on the outskirts of Niseko’s Hirafu Village. This ideal location allows guests to enjoy the tranquil surroundings and stunning views of Mount Yotei, with the added convenience of being just five minutes away from the ski fields and attractions of Hirafu Village. Completed in 2019, this swanky new chalet presents a modern Japanese design aesthetic with Birchwood floors, feature walls and open communal living and dining areas. Large windows in the living areas and bedrooms provide stunning views of Mount Yotei and the raised tatami room is perfect for the kids or a Japanese-style dining experience. The intelligent layout accommodates up to ten guests (eight adults and two children) and is perfect for families or groups of friends, with four ensuite bedrooms and extra bedding for the tatami room. Two covered carports and a secure dry room for ski equipment make this the perfect winter haven designed for you to enjoy Niseko’s famous powder snow. The large dining table comfortably seats eight and the well-appointed sunken kitchen with bar seating is perfect when entertaining. After a long day on the slopes, why not take advantage of Niseko Gourmet, which can deliver groceries, or delicious and hot meals. They can even arrange for an in-chalet private dining experience wherein you can enjoy Japanese, Thai or western dishes prepared especially for you. Guests checking into Aoyama Lodge can enjoy a complimentary breakfast welcome pack. Aoyama Lodge is the perfect mountain retreat from which to enjoy the unique experiences offered by the Niseko region.
address: Hirafu Village, Niseko, Japan.

title: casa la mount chalet - annupuri niseko japan
description: Ideally positioned in Annupuri Village, Casa La Mount promises to be your quintessential mountain retreat. The spacious four-bedroom stone and wood chalet is reminiscent of a traditional Whistler Ski Lodge design, blending into the surrounding nature and just 850 meters from Niseko Annupuri ski lifts. The classic styling of Casa La Mount is matched by sumptuous furnishings, large bedrooms, and elegant modern decor giving the chalet a sense of character and a warm, lived-in atmosphere. An open-plan living area is highlighted with a huge designer sofa and the high ceilings complement full wall gable windows that present stunning panoramic views over the Niseko Valley to the Konbu Range. Natural light spotlights wooden tones find voice throughout the luxurious setting. On a quiet street, you will love Casa La Mount’s amazing location close to the ski lifts as well as some very famous restaurants with modern cafes not too far away. Homely and convenient, it overlooks a massive block surrounded by gardens with ample area for outside activities during summer or winter and parking for multiple cars. Jostling for the position of the most favoured space in the chalet, the dining area is where fun and laughter will be had, hands wrapped around a hot cup of cocoa. The ten-seater dining table, island kitchen with bar seating, Miele induction stove-fan forced oven and large deck make it the perfect place for entertaining or indulging in one of the in-house catering menus provided by Niseko Gourmet.
address: Annupuri Village, Niseko, Japan.

title: Villa Saengootsa - 5 Bedroom Villa
description: Villa Saengootsa is a sophisticated luxury haven, carefully crafted to suit its spectacular surroundings to create an overall atmosphere of modern tropical minimalism.The open plan design of the villa makes it the perfect accommodation choice for a group getaway, corporate retreat and family holidays to share and enjoy a combination of personal relaxation time and social moments by the pool or sharing meals on the BBQ terrace. A dedicated AV room and attached games room with a billiards table encourage a communal holiday atmosphere. The villa's sea view location on a lush hillside ensures privacy as well as serene peace and quiet. However, the villa is situated ideally so that should you wish to leave its gorgeous grounds, you can reach many of the island's top dining, shopping and beach destinations within an easy drive from your doorstep.
address: Saengootsa, 1/21 Kamala Soi 16 Rd, Kamala, Kathu District, Phuket 83120, Thailand

title: Villa Fah Sai
description:
Welcome to Villa Fah Sai – an elegant and luxurious tropical escape in Phuket. Please note that there is ongoing construction which may affect the villa’s views, but rest assured that every effort is made to maintain comfort and service. 

Designed with privacy in mind, this villa offers five ensuite bedrooms and a separate entrance that sets it apart from other properties in the estate. Guests will appreciate the thoughtful layout that includes a dedicated game room furnished with comfy sofas and a state-of-the-art entertainment system, all set against floor-to-ceiling glass walls that capture panoramic pool views.

Villa Fah Sai is perfect for families, friends, and couples seeking a refined getaway with modern amenities and an ideal setting for relaxation and celebration.
address: Villa 8, Samsara Estate, Kamala Soi 16, Tambon Kamala, Kathu 83120, Phuket

title: Villa Rom Trai
description:
Elevate your holiday at Villa Rom Trai, a stunning multi-level retreat perched 40 meters above sea level in an exclusive Phuket estate.

Also known as Villa 9, this elegant property boasts five beautifully appointed bedrooms with king-size beds and panoramic views of Patong Bay and the Andaman Ocean. Floor-to-ceiling sliding doors on the terraces ensure an uninterrupted vista of the sea, while each level is thoughtfully designed to maximize natural light and space.

Additional highlights include a 12-meter infinity-edge swimming pool, an elevator for easy access between floors, and a fully fitted kitchen with a dedicated dining area. With complimentary Wi-Fi and attentive staff, Villa Rom Trai promises a luxurious and unforgettable escape.
address: 1/12 Kamala Soi 16 Rd, Tambon Kamala, Amphoe Kathu, Chang Wat Phuket 83120, Thailand

title: Villa Viman
description:
Step into Villa Viman – a top-tier vacation getaway on the seaside of Phuket Island. This expansive 1,280 sqm villa is designed for large groups who crave fine living and unparalleled comfort.

Every space in Villa Viman is carefully curated over three levels, featuring plush contemporary furnishings inspired by Asian culture. The master suite and five guest bedrooms each come with a luxurious ensuite bathroom and unique touches such as ocean views, private balconies, and custom-designed details.

Whether you are relaxing in the spacious living areas, enjoying the panoramic vistas from your private terrace, or taking advantage of in-villa amenities such as a playroom and home theater, Villa Viman offers an exotic escape that pampers every guest.

title: Villa Amanzi Kamala
description:
Immerse yourself in the breathtaking designer elegance of Villa Amanzi Kamala – a tropical haven set on a hillside near Kamala Beach. This award-winning villa boasts six luxurious bedrooms and a 15-metre infinity pool, all framed by spectacular ocean views and lush tropical gardens.

The villa’s modern design is accentuated by its innovative use of natural materials and state-of-the-art amenities. Enjoy a seamless blend of indoor and outdoor living in expansive spaces that feature high-tech lighting, an iPad-controlled sound system, and a refined yet relaxed atmosphere throughout the home.

Located within the exclusive Cape Amarin Estate and minutes away from premier Phuket attractions, Villa Amanzi Kamala offers impeccable five-star service from a dedicated team of professionals, ensuring your island getaway is both effortless and unforgettable.
address: Cape Amarin Estate, Kamala, Phuket, Thailand.

title: Sava Villa 2 - Villa Amarelo
description:
Step into Sava Villa 2 – a modern beachfront oasis designed to merge expansive indoor and alfresco living with the natural beauty of the surroundings. This villa boasts a 25-metre infinity pool and a spacious pool deck perfect for outdoor dining and barbecue gatherings.

Enjoy direct access to the beach from an elegant outdoor sala, while a host of complimentary estate amenities and cutting-edge indoor games and entertainment systems ensure endless fun. Every detail is taken care of by a professional team including a villa manager, private chef, dedicated villa attendants, a meticulous gardener, and expert pool maintenance and security staff.

Sava Villa 2 is the perfect choice for those who seek a seamless blend of luxury, convenience, and coastal relaxation.
address: 77FG+5J3, Khok Kloi, Takua Thung District, Phang Nga 82140, Thailand

title: AYA Niseko Atelier: Minimalist Luxury Escape
description:
Experience minimalist luxury at AYA Niseko Atelier—a retreat designed for modern travelers who appreciate simplicity and refined design.

Set against the breathtaking backdrop of the mountain, every element of the atelier is carefully curated to blend contemporary comforts with the serene beauty of Niseko. The space features airy, open-plan living areas with clean lines and natural materials, creating an atmosphere of calm and understated elegance.

During the day, enjoy uninterrupted views and a light, uncluttered environment that invites exploration of the nearby slopes. In the evening, the venue transforms into a sanctuary of relaxation where guests can unwind, share intimate conversations, or indulge in gourmet meals prepared using locally sourced ingredients.

AYA Niseko Atelier is more than just a place to stay—it's an immersive experience designed to inspire, relax, and rejuvenate, making it the perfect hideaway for those who travel light yet seek memorable experiences.
address: 4-chome-4-5 Nisekohirafu 1 Jo, Kutchan, Abuta District, Hokkaido 044-0080, Japan

title: Villa Lomchoy
description:
Indulge in the elegance of Villa Lomchoy, a refined retreat facing the vast Andaman Sea.

This sophisticated villa offers mesmerizing ocean views through expansive glass doors and high ceilings, creating an atmosphere of serene luxury. Step through the dramatic indoor balcony and discover a tropical interior adorned with colorful rugs, contemporary art, and striking sculptures that perfectly complement the ambiance.

Each deluxe bedroom opens onto its own private terrace, offering refreshing breezes and jaw-dropping vistas, while the master bedroom features a private whirlpool for ultimate relaxation. Villa Lomchoy is an exquisite setting for unforgettable moments of indulgence and tranquility.
address: Samsara Villa Estate, Kamala, Kathu, Phuket, Thailand

The villa offers expansive indoor spaces seamlessly connected to alfresco areas, including an 18-metre infinity pool and a pool deck with a built-in barbecue area. Guests enjoy complimentary access to the estate’s amenities as well as in-villa sports equipment such as kayaks and bicycles.

A newly built media room equipped with state-of-the-art entertainment systems adds to the villa’s appeal. With a dedicated team including a villa manager, private chef, villa attendants, gardener, pool maintenance crew, and estate security, every detail is managed to perfection so you can focus on unwinding in style.

Sava Villa 7 – Villa Aqua offers an extraordinary fusion of indoor and alfresco living. This elegant villa features an 18-metre infinity pool with a pool deck and barbecue area, setting the stage for relaxed, sun-drenched days.

A private spa complete with massage beds, sauna, and steam room elevates the experience, while in-villa sports equipment including kayaks and paddle boards ensure that adventure is never far away. title: Malaiwana Residences - Penthouse
description:
Discover the vibrant energy of the Malaiwana Residences Penthouse, where contemporary tropical design meets effortless island living. Set high in an exclusive estate on Phuket’s northwest coast, these four-bedroom penthouses offer panoramic sea and sunset views over Naithon Beach.

Enjoy a tranquil getaway with impeccable hospitality as spacious living areas, generously proportioned bedrooms, and inviting 20-metre private pools frame breathtaking Andaman Sea sunsets. Sliding glass doors seamlessly merge stylish indoor and outdoor spaces, ensuring that every room is bathed in natural light.

Step outside to explore the serene beauty of Naithon Beach—a one-kilometre stretch of powder-soft sand just a short walk or buggy ride away. Whether you choose to relax on the beach, snorkel in crystal clear waters, or savor fresh grilled seafood from local vendors, every moment is enhanced by the warmth and expertise of a dedicated staff.
address: Naithon Beach, Thalang, Phuket, Thailand.

title: Villa Orca
description:
Villa Orca is a majestic sea-view retreat that combines a main house with four bedrooms and a stand-alone bungalow featuring the fifth and master bedroom. Designed in a tropical-modern fashion, the villa is fully serviced and finely appointed to delight your senses with earthy tones and natural textures.

Nestled into a lush, verdant tropical hillside adjacent to a protected natural forest, Villa Orca enjoys a north-facing (Feng Shui approved) position. It offers stunning ocean views over Plai Laem temple and captures the scenic vistas of neighboring islands such as Koh Phangan and Koh Som. Its proximity to Choeng Mon Beach, boutique hotels, restaurants, and the famous Big Buddha Temple ensures you experience the best of Koh Samui.

title: SAVA BEACH VILLAS
description:
Sava Beach Villas is a collection of seven fully staffed, high-end villas perfectly positioned on pristine Natai Beach just north of Phuket. Each villa is a masterpiece of modern architecture and five-star design, with its own massive private pool ranging from 18 to 25 metres.

Every villa in the collection is unique. Some feature an indulgent private spa, while others boast a dedicated kids’ room with playful elements. The collection includes properties such as Villa Tievoli with seven bedrooms (complete with a kids’ bunk room), Villa Amarelo, Villa Cielo, Villa Essenza, and Villa Malee Sai – each offering six luxurious bedrooms – as well as Aqua Villa and Villa Roxo, which provide four bedrooms each.

Together, these villas cater to a range of tastes and group sizes, ensuring that whether you’re seeking a family retreat or a sophisticated escape with friends, Sava Beach Villas deliver unmatched luxury and seaside relaxation.
address: Natai Beach Kok Kloy, Sava Beach Villas - Villa Essenza 36, Thakua Thung, Phang Nga 82140, Thailand

title: Sungai Tinggi Beach Villa
description:
Sungai Tinggi Beach Villa is a **stunning beachfront estate** set on **over 100 meters of pristine coastline** in **Pererenan, Bali**. Featuring **a six-bedroom main villa, an open-sided living pavilion, and an 18-meter infinity pool**, this villa offers a luxurious tropical escape with **unrivaled ocean views**.

This **private oasis** is surrounded by **lush gardens filled with frangipanis, coconut palms, and tropical foliage**, creating a **serene and picturesque retreat**. Guests can relax by the **lagoon-front pool**, take in the **stunning sunsets**, or hold **weddings and special events** in the villa’s **dedicated beachfront event space**.

The villa’s **traditional Balinese architecture**, featuring **exotic timber floors, alang-alang thatched roofs, and handpicked antique artifacts**, enhances its **authentic island charm**. With **friendly local staff providing five-star service**, Sungai Tinggi Beach Villa is **perfect for families, groups, and event gatherings** seeking the ultimate **Bali beachfront experience**.

title: Tirtha Bayu Estate
description:
Tirtha Bayu Estate is a spectacular clifftop retreat overlooking the serene Cemagi Beach in Bali. Designed for grandeur and relaxation, this estate features 11 luxurious bedrooms across two villas, offering 180-degree panoramic ocean views. 

The estate’s contemporary Balinese architecture blends seamlessly with traditional elements, including soaring Torajan-inspired ceilings, hand-carved furnishings, and expansive infinity pools. Guests can immerse themselves in the cultural charm of Bali while enjoying the estate’s proximity to iconic clifftop temples and the vibrant scene of Canggu, just nine kilometers away.

Perfect for weddings and events, Tirtha Bayu Estate boasts expansive sun decks, lush terraced lawns, and an exquisite self-contained honeymoon suite, making it an exceptional choice for intimate gatherings and luxurious getaways.
address: Cemagi Beach, Seseh-Tanah Lot, Bali, Indonesia.

title: Villa Simona Oasis
description:
Villa Simona Oasis is a **stunning five-bedroom retreat** nestled in the lush **tropical landscape of Canggu**, Bali. This **family-friendly villa** offers a peaceful sanctuary surrounded by **flowing rice terraces** and two **sacred streams**, blending nature and luxury effortlessly.

Spread across **5,000 square meters of tropical gardens**, the villa features a **sparkling 13-meter pool**, contemporary interiors designed by **Elaina Myers**, and **romantic pathways** that connect the **spacious suites**. Guests can unwind in **extraordinary stone-carved baths** high above the ground, where the **sounds of nature** create a serene atmosphere.

Perfect for **extended families, larger groups, or wedding parties**, Villa Simona Oasis offers **privacy, tranquility, and indulgence** in one of Bali’s most sought-after locations. Whether exploring Canggu’s vibrant culture or enjoying the villa’s peaceful surroundings, guests are guaranteed an unforgettable experience.

Villa Melissa is an exclusive beachfront villa in Canggu, Bali, where the soothing sounds of ocean waves create a serene and luxurious escape. Its elegant Balinese-inspired interiors, spacious outdoor areas, and modern amenities make it an exceptional choice for **weddings, events, and private celebrations**. **Villa LeGa** is a **luxurious beachfront villa in Batu Belig, Seminyak**, offering **five spacious bedrooms, a private 12-meter pool, and breathtaking ocean views**. Located **right on the sand**, this contemporary villa is perfect for **families and groups looking for a high-end beachside retreat**.

The villa features **expansive air-conditioned living areas**, an **elegant dining space for 12 guests**, and a **fully equipped modern kitchen**. Guests can relax in the **TV lounge, rooftop terrace, or the shaded pool deck surrounded by lush gardens**. Each bedroom boasts a **king-sized bed, dressing area, and a semi-tropical ensuite bathroom**. The **master suites on the upper level** offer **unmatched sunset views over the ocean**.

A **private chef** prepares delicious meals from a **customized menu**, while the dedicated **villa team** provides exceptional service. Within walking distance to **Bali’s top beach clubs, including W Retreat & Spa and traditional beachside cafés**, **Villa LeGa** offers **the ultimate beachfront living experience**.

title: Tsubasa Chalet: Award-Winning 530 sqm Alpine Retreat at Hanaridge Estate
description: Experience the epitome of alpine elegance at Tsubasa Chalet—an award-winning 530 sqm retreat nestled within the exclusive Hanaridge Estate in Hanazono. Named Japan's Best Ski Chalet 2024 at the World Ski Awards, this luxurious property is managed by a dedicated team (including a concierge) who ensure every detail of your winter getaway is perfect. Enjoy the convenience of up to two drivers for your transfers, along with wellness amenities such as a 40 sqm private natural onsen with indoor and outdoor pools, a modern gym, and a yoga studio. Tsubasa Chalet sets the stage for an unforgettable alpine escape.
address: 267-15 Iwaobetsu, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0082

title: Villa Mandalay
description:
Villa Mandalay is a **breathtaking seven-bedroom luxury villa** nestled in **lush rice paddies** with **stunning ocean views** in **Munggu village, Tanah Lot, Bali**. This **secluded tropical sanctuary** offers a **25-meter swimming pool, an open-air dining pavilion, and expansive landscaped gardens**, making it perfect for **weddings, retreats, and group vacations**.

The villa’s **Balinese-style pavilions** are **adorned with Indonesian artwork, ethnic artifacts, and handcrafted furniture**, creating a serene and sophisticated atmosphere. Guests can **enjoy sunset views** from the poolside pavilion, unwind in the **Finnish-style sauna overlooking a lotus pond**, or **watch movies in the mezzanine-level home theater**.

For golf enthusiasts, **Villa Mandalay boasts a private six-hole pitch-and-putt golf course**. A **talented chef** prepares delicious **Balinese and international cuisine**, and a **private car with a driver** is available for island exploration. Just **10 minutes from Tanah Lot Temple** and **Canggu’s vibrant scene**, this **secluded paradise** offers both **tranquility and easy access to Bali’s best attractions**.
address: Munggu village, Tanah Lot, south-west Bali, Indonesia.

title: Purana Residence at Panacea Retreat
description:
Experience refined luxury at Purana Residence at Panacea Retreat. Wake up each day to stunning ocean views and relax by a 20-meter infinity pool surrounded by lush tropical greenery.

This exceptional residence offers a seamless indoor-outdoor living experience, where spacious, light-filled interiors merge with breathtaking vistas. With modern design elements and a dedicated service team, every detail is tailored for an unforgettable stay.

title: Mizunara Chalet
description:
Discover the serene elegance of Mizunara Chalet—a sustainable mountain oasis in Hirafu designed for a peaceful retreat throughout the year.

Crafted with a clever blend of concrete walls, oak wood flooring, and exposed brick accents, the interior is bathed in warm, soft lighting and modern minimalist décor. This four-bedroom chalet comfortably sleeps twelve, with two master bedrooms featuring split king-size beds and luxurious ensuite bathrooms complete with both a shower and bathtub.

On the ground level, a guest room with a queen-size bed and an additional room with bunk beds offer versatile accommodation. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame stunning views of Mount Yotei, creating a Zen-like atmosphere. Ideally located near local restaurants, bars, and the Grand Hirafu ski gondola, Mizunara Chalet is perfect for families or groups seeking designer chic in a natural setting.
address: Hirafu village, Niseko, Japan.

title: Ajisai Chalet hirafu niseko japan
description: What better way to recharge those batteries than by breathing in fresh mountain air, while overlooking the stunning vistas from the terrace of your own private luxury chalet? Located in the centre of Hirafu village – one of four interconnected resorts that make up the world-class Niseko ski area – the three-bedroom Ajisai Chalet has a spacious lounge with a comfortable corner sofa, as well as a cushioned armchair which is ideal for an afternoon snooze. Ajisai Çhalet's contemporary open-plan kitchen with a long island provides an excellent meeting point for sharing the day’s exciting adventures with loved ones. The eight-seater dining table is ideal for meals full of laughter and chatter. This newly renovated dining area overlooks a lovely garden and has amazing vistas of the nearby mount Yotei and Mount Annupuri. The chalet offers three comfortable and bright bedrooms, and three bathrooms. Two of the bathrooms also have a bathtub, perfect hot-soaking those tired muscles. Two bedrooms have been recently renovated and extended to house a queen bed plus a bunk bed for two in each. These are perfect for families or friends who wish to sleep together. The master bedroom has a queen bed that can be split into twins and an ensuite bathroom. With three large bathrooms, there’s unlikely to be a queue in the morning, despite the chalet sleeping ten guests. With its excellent amenities, the beautifully designed Ajisai Chalet is a superb choice for a couple of families travelling together. Looking for a centrally-located and stylish home to return to after spending a day in the great outdoors? Your search ends here.
address: Hirafu village, Niseko, Japan.

title: Ski-in-ski-out luxury on Niseko's Family Run
description: Nestled amidst a landscape of powdery white splendor Niseko Kyo is Hirafu Niseko's only ski in/out property that can house families and groups up to a max of 14. Opening ahead of the 23/24 ski season. Niseko Kyo houses 22 luxury residencies, generously sized and most equipped with their own in room private onsen. With options that overlook Hirafu's Ace Family Run or the majestic Mt. Yotei. Each residence features a curated selection of luxury furniture from distinguished brands Galotti & Radice, Songdream and Molteni & C's.
address: 3-2 Niseko Hirafu 1-jo 4-chome, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0080

title: mizunara chalet - hirafu niseko japan
description: Although built to withstand the area’s cold, snowy winters in the most environmentally sustainable way, the sumptuous four-bedroom Mizunara Chalet is a wonderful mountain oasis any time of the year. The clever combination of concrete walls with oak wood flooring, exposed brick walls, modern minimalist furniture and warm soft lighting creates a very chic and sophisticated vibe throughout. Mizunara Chalet comfortably sleeps twelve people. The two master bedrooms upstairs are furnished with split king-size beds and ensuite bathrooms with a shower and bathtub. The ground floor incorporates a guest bedroom with a queen-size bed and an additional bedroom with bunk beds – handy if you’re traveling with a larger group or if you have adventurous children. Both bedrooms share a spacious bathroom fitted with a shower and a bathtub. The kitchen and living areas are generous enough to accommodate a group of ten, while the chalet’s innovative architecture, split-level design and floor-to-ceiling windows encourage a genuine sense of personal space and a ‘Zen’-like atmosphere – especially against the spectacular backdrop of Mount Yotei. Situated in Hirafu’s lower village, the chalet is only a few minutes’ walk from most of the area’s restaurants and bars, as well as the Grand Hirafu ski gondola.Exuding designer chic and modern grandeur, Mizunara Chalet would perfectly fit a family or a group of friends looking to experience the best of what Hirafu has to offer, surrounded by swish luxury – come winter or summer.
address: Hirafu village, Niseko, Japan.

title: seshu chalet - hirafu niseko japan
description: Known for its Japanese flair, exquisite hospitality and world-class dining, Hirafu Village has developed a stellar reputation for outdoor pursuits while drawing in an increasingly international crowd. And speaking of flair, we can’t think of a more glamorous place to experience Hirafu’s winter or summer than the stunning five-bedroom Seshu Chalet. Sustainably designed using natural building materials, Seshu Chalet dazzles with stylish interiors. Set across three floors, this is a vast yet delightfully cosy home to return to after spending a day hiking, skiing, playing golf – or indeed taking part in any of Hirafu’s other endless nature activities. Seshu Chalet has two spacious master bedrooms and two identical guest rooms, each appointed with split king-size beds, chic designer furniture and sumptuous ensuite bathrooms. The fifth bedroom can be set up with twin beds, or as a charming Japanese-style tatami room, with access to a separate toilet and shower. Meals are a social affair at Seshu Chalet, gathered around the contemporary, open-plan kitchen or dining space that can easily seat twelve people. For some fresh air, you can enjoy barbecues on the extensive first-floor terrace during summertime or impromptu alfresco dining with a view. The chalet’s three lounge areas are particularly cosy in the evening, thanks to their tasteful, soft lighting, while the modern fireplace’s warm and relaxing glow serves as an ongoing invitation for sharing each other’s outdoor adventure tales. With its gorgeous design, excellent amenities and central location, Seshu Chalet represents mountain living at its swankiest – whatever the season may be.
address: Hirafu village, Niseko, Japan.

title: Intuition: Luxury Living Amidst Natural Splendor
description:
Nestled in a tranquil forest and crowned by the magnificent Mount Yotei, Intuition is a six-story architectural marvel that redefines luxury living. This distinctive estate offers elegantly appointed residences, gourmet dining experiences, and rejuvenating onsen facilities—all seamlessly integrated into a serene natural setting.

Intuition enjoys a prime location adjacent to the village center, where ski lifts, eclectic dining, and boutique shopping are just steps away. Yet, it remains a secluded haven, uniquely set within a lush forest that preserves the natural beauty and calm of the surroundings. This thoughtful design ensures that every guest can savor peaceful moments while being immersed in spectacular panoramic vistas.

Every detail of Intuition has been carefully curated to provide a full range of luxury amenities and seamless services by our dedicated team. Whether you're looking for an active mountain adventure or a tranquil retreat, Intuition promises an unforgettable stay that perfectly blends convenience with the beauty of nature.
address: 38-6 Kabayama, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0078

title: Avasara Residence at Panacea Retreat
description: Just a short drive from the beach and nestled within the breathtaking landscape of Bophut Hills, this 5-bedroom villa serves as an excellent starting point for discovering the splendor of Koh Samui. - The spacious outdoor area boasts a 20-metre infinity pool, a poolside bar, an outdoor audio system, alfresco dining, and comfortable daybeds where you can enjoy your favorite cocktail while taking in the breathtaking view. - Operated by a villa staff dedicated to delivering the ultimate holiday experience, and with the expertise of a private chef who carefully crafts menus using locally sourced fresh produce.
address: 51, 25, Bo Put, Amphoe Ko Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

title: Villa Asi | 6 Bedroom Villa - Chaweng, Koh Samui
description:
Villa Asi is a luxurious six-bedroom hillside villa overlooking Chaweng Bay, offering a unique blend of modern design and traditional elegance. The villa features high ceilings, oversized windows, and an open living space that welcomes a cool, refreshing breeze throughout the day.

Communal areas are thoughtfully designed for gatherings, and the expansive infinity swimming pool on the main floor invites you to relax under the tropical sun. With dedicated staff including a maid, chef, and villa manager, every detail is meticulously taken care of. A second pool nestled among the guest ensuite bedrooms adds an extra touch of luxury, making it perfect for families and groups seeking a memorable getaway.

Experience the perfect fusion of style, comfort, and exceptional service at Villa Asi.
address: 166-170/26 Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

title: Villa Indrani
description:
Villa Indrani is a **stylish five-bedroom luxury retreat** located just **500 meters from Berawa Beach** in **Canggu, Bali**. Perfect for **families and groups**, this spacious haven blends **mid-century modern design** with **traditional Balinese charm**, offering **an elegant and relaxing getaway**.

The villa features **two grand master bedrooms** with **ensuite bathrooms** exuding **colonial-style romance**, alongside **three additional guest bedrooms** with pool and garden views. A **beautifully designed open-plan living space** with **floor-to-ceiling windows** allows for both **outdoor tropical living** and **air-conditioned comfort**.

Guests can enjoy the **sun-soaked pool deck**, unwind on the **lush garden lawn**, or indulge in **Indonesian and Western cuisine** prepared by a **private chef**. The villa’s **butler service** ensures personalized hospitality, while the **vibrant Canggu and Seminyak beach clubs, shops, and cafés** are just a short drive away. **Villa Indrani is the perfect blend of beachside relaxation and Bali’s luxury lifestyle.**
address: Berawa, Canggu, Bali, Indonesia.

title: Inasia Beach Villa
description:
Discover Inasia Beach Villa – an exceptional beachfront villa complex that offers two independent luxury units overlooking Koh Samui’s west coast at Lipa Noi. Enjoy one of the island’s most beautiful views with spectacular sunsets over the offshore Five Islands group.

Choose between a low-rise beachfront garden villa and a three-level ocean view villa. The garden villa features separate living and dining areas that open onto an L-shaped 15-meter infinity pool and landscaped lawns, while the ocean view villa boasts an eight-meter infinity pool with an expansive terrace and sala. Both units are elegantly furnished, with eight double ensuite bedrooms accommodating up to 16 guests.

Ideal for larger groups and private events, Inasia Beach Villa offers a self-sufficient experience with a fully equipped kitchen, living room, and games room complete with a full-size billiards table.

title: Baan Puri
description:
Escape to the tranquility of Baan Puri, a luxurious beachfront villa in Lipa Noi on the west coast of Koh Samui. Designed as a private sanctuary, this exquisite retreat is infused with elegant Thai motifs and provides direct access to one of the island’s most pristine beaches.

Enjoy breathtaking views of the famous Five Islands and the Thai coastline from the comfort of your villa. With tastefully designed interiors and seamless indoor-outdoor living, Baan Puri offers the ultimate beachfront experience for families and large groups seeking relaxation in a stunning tropical setting.

title: Corniche Hirafu: Pinnacle of Alpine Luxury & Wellness Retreat
description: Immerse yourself in refined alpine luxury at Corniche Hirafu, a dreamy chalet nestled in the woods just moments away from Hirafu's vibrant center. This grand 580 sqm chalet boasts expansive living and dining areas with soaring 6m-high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows that capture marvellous mountain views. Located in the heart of Hirafu's famed Millionaires' Row—the first house built on this high-end estate—Corniche Hirafu offers the perfect blend of privacy and convenience, with easy access to the gondola, ski lift, and the array of restaurants and bars in Hirafu's Middle Village. Designed for wellness enthusiasts, the chalet features a natural hot spring well that flows into a private onsen, complemented by a sauna, plunge pool, and stylish sky terraces for ultimate relaxation.
address: 165-41, Niseko Hirafu 2 Jo 1 Chome, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-Gun, Hokkaido 044-0089

Beds and Bedding.Configuration:: Hollywood Twin Double | King/Hollywood Twin | King/Hollywood Twin | 3x Single/Hollywood Triple

title: Luxury Chalet Oasis in Hirafu
description:
Experience unmatched luxury and tranquility in the heart of Niseko's winter wonderland at the beautiful Yuki Sugi Chalet. This elegant two-storey villa is the ideal base for your Hokkaido adventures, offering a serene retreat where modern comforts meet pristine natural beauty.

Nestled within a tranquil forest setting, Yuki Sugi Chalet is perfectly positioned near Hirafu's vibrant nightlife and dining venues, yet maintains an atmosphere of complete privacy. With world-class ski slopes just a short walk away and only 450 meters from the family ski lift, guests enjoy effortless ski-in ski-out access.

Accommodating up to 14 guests, the chalet features five spacious bedrooms—each with its own en-suite bathroom. Relax in the luxurious living room with breathtaking views of Mount Yotei, or indulge in the private onsen that overlooks lush forest vistas, creating a perfect haven after an exciting day on the slopes.
address: 38-22 Kabayama, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0078

title: Song Saa Chalet – Niseko's Cozy Retreat
description:
Escape to the serene charm of Hokkaido's winter wonderland at Song Saa Chalet, a hidden gem designed for families and groups seeking an intimate escape from the modern world. Tucked away in a peaceful corner of Niseko, this private chalet invites you to reconnect with loved ones and recharge in an environment that exudes warmth and tranquility.

The chalet boasts six spacious bedrooms spread over two floors, a modern open-plan kitchen and living area perfect for communal gatherings, and luxurious furnishings that enhance its refined ambiance. With unobstructed views of the picturesque Japanese mountain range and a dedicated traditional Tatami room that offers an authentic cultural experience, Song Saa Chalet promises a memorable retreat where every detail is designed for comfort and elegance.
address: 432-47 Niseko, Niseko-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 048-1511

Beds and Bedding.Configuration:: Twin | Twin | Twin | Twin | Twin | Twin

title: Olaf House
description:
Discover the inviting warmth of Olaf House, a serene family abode gracefully spread across three levels in a peaceful setting.

Bathed in natural light from expansive floor-to-ceiling windows and a dramatic double-height atrium, this home is perfectly designed for multi-generational living. Three cozy bedrooms on one floor ensure convenience, while a versatile tatami room on the third level serves as a playroom by day or extra sleeping space by night.

A dedicated social space features an open living and dining area alongside a fully equipped kitchen—ideal for preparing family favorites. After a day of adventure, enjoy the luxury of having piping hot meals delivered straight to your doorstep.
address: 155-227 Aza, Yamada, Kutchan, Abuta District, Hokkaido 044-0081, Japan

Experience the grandeur of Sava Villa 1 – a spectacular property built for both indoor and outdoor living. This villa features expansive living areas that effortlessly flow into an alfresco dining space on a pool deck, centered around a stunning 25-metre infinity pool.

Designed for ultimate relaxation, the property also includes dedicated wellness facilities such as an in-villa spa, sauna, steam room, and a beauty salon. A specially designed children’s room complete with bunk beds and a slide ensures that even the little ones have their share of fun, while a state-of-the-art home theatre and entertainment system keep everyone engaged.

With a full team of professional staff including a villa manager, private chef, villa attendants, gardener, pool maintenance crew, and spa therapists, every detail is attended to so you can simply unwind in luxurious comfort.

description:
Villa Natha is a contemporary private hillside villa offering breathtaking 180-degree views of Koh Samui’s tropical coastline and the crystalline waters of the Gulf of Siam. Its stunning multi-level architecture creates a seamless blend of indoor and outdoor living.

Expansive open-plan living and dining areas flow onto a furnished poolside terrace, while five luxurious bedrooms spread over three floors each feature ensuite bathrooms and indulgent bathing options. Experience modern luxury and natural beauty in perfect harmony at Villa Natha.

title: Villa 1880
description:
**Villa 1880** is a **spectacular design-driven villa** in **Batu Belig, Bali**, seamlessly blending **colonial charm with contemporary luxury**. This **five-bedroom estate** accommodates up to **8 adults and 8 children**, making it perfect for **multiple families or groups** seeking a refined yet relaxed getaway.

The heart of the villa is a beautifully **restored 1880s plantation house from Borneo**, constructed from ironwood, complemented by **modern architectural additions**. Designed by a **renowned interior architect and vintage furniture collector**, Villa 1880 boasts **mid-century Italian furnishings, contemporary art, custom lighting, and high-spec amenities**.

Guests can enjoy a **rooftop sunset terrace, a private pool, and expansive living areas**, all enhanced by **mood lighting and a state-of-the-art water filtration system**. Just minutes from **Batu Belig Beach and Seminyak’s vibrant dining and nightlife scene**, **Villa 1880** offers a **stylish yet comfortable retreat** in **one of Bali’s most sought-after locations**.
address: Batu Belig, Gang Daksina, Bali.

title: MAISON MATISSE
description: Villa Maison Matisse is a true hidden gem: a palatial jungle escape perched on a tropical riverbank alongside the beautiful Seseh Beach. The palatial Villa Maison Matisse is tropical paradise come to life. The five-bedroom estate offers ultimate relaxation and soul-soothing rejuvenation surrounded by the unspoilt nature of Southwest Bali, worlds away from any modern life stress. From the lush rainforest surroundings and pristine pool, to the state-of-the-art entertainment systems, the property caters to your every need. The thoughtful design of the villa embraces beauty and romance of the property’s divine surroundings, and you’ll even be greeted by a gentle tropical river flowing serenely between the pool and the beach. A private Balinese temple peacefully presides over the beautiful estate, so this dream of a villa is guaranteed to give complete relaxation.
address: Jl. Pura Bengkak Jl. Pantai Seseh, Cemagi, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia

title: Villa Bangkuang
description:
**Villa Bangkuang** is a **stunning five-bedroom estate** nestled on the edge of **Seseh Village**, just **300 meters from a wild black sand beach**. Located between **Canggu and Tanah Lot**, this **recently remodeled villa** offers **a seamless blend of traditional Balinese architecture and modern luxury**.

The villa features **a spacious 17-meter pool, beautifully designed pavilions with thatched alang-alang roofs, and interiors filled with handpicked antique and custom-built furniture**. Designed for **multi-generational families or groups of friends**, Villa Bangkuang has **multiple indoor and outdoor living areas overlooking lush rice fields stretching to the ocean**.

Guests can enjoy the **peace and serenity of a secluded retreat**, while still being within easy reach of **Canggu’s vibrant cafés and the famous Tanah Lot temple**. Whether you seek **relaxation, cultural immersion, or adventure**, **Villa Bangkuang** delivers a **truly unique and tranquil Bali experience**.
address: Seseh Village, South-west Bali, Indonesia.

title: The Maples Niseko: Premier Ski-In Ski-Out Luxury
description:
Experience the ultimate alpine lifestyle at The Maples Niseko, one of the region's most coveted ski-in ski-out hotels. Boasting 73 meticulously designed units ranging from studios and two-bedroom residences to expansive three-bedroom options and penthouses, this property caters to every type of traveler. The thoughtful layout emphasizes large, livable spaces and functional kitchens, ensuring that every detail supports a comfortable mountain retreat.

At The Maples, amenities are crafted with residents in mind. Enjoy exclusive access to a dedicated ski room and a cozy cafe that opens directly onto the Family ski run, providing true ski-in ski-out convenience. Immerse yourself in a complete lifestyle experience that captures the essence of Niseko's legendary good life, where luxury and nature meet in perfect harmony.
address: 5-41 Niseko Hirafu 1-jo 4-chome, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0080

title: Ajisai Chalet – Contemporary Retreat in Hirafu, Niseko
description:
Rejuvenate your senses at Ajisai Chalet, a stylish and newly renovated three-bedroom retreat located in the heart of Hirafu village – one of the four interconnected resorts that make up the world-class Niseko ski area. Imagine breathing in fresh mountain air while overlooking breathtaking vistas from your private terrace, an ideal setting to recharge after a day on the slopes.

Inside, you are welcomed by a spacious lounge area furnished with a comfortable corner sofa and a cushioned armchair perfect for an afternoon snooze. The contemporary open-plan kitchen features a long island that serves as a meeting point for sharing the day's adventures, while an elegant eight-seater dining table sets the stage for meals filled with laughter and chatter. The dining area, newly renovated to overlook a lovely garden, offers amazing views of Mount Yotei and Mount Annupuri, enhancing every dining experience.

Ajisai Chalet offers three bright, comfortable bedrooms and three well-appointed bathrooms – two of which include bathtubs for soaking away tired muscles. Recent renovations have expanded two of the bedrooms to accommodate a queen bed plus a bunk bed for two, ensuring that families or groups of friends can sleep together in comfort. The master bedroom, featuring a versatile queen bed that can split into twins and an ensuite bathroom, further underlines the chalet's thoughtful design.

With its excellent amenities and central location, Ajisai Chalet is a superb choice for families traveling together who are looking for a centrally-located, stylish home to return to after a day of outdoor adventure.
address: Hirafu village, Niseko, Japan.

Featuring four spacious bedrooms and an array of common areas—including an infinity pool—the villa is designed for those who appreciate prime luxury and comfort. Its interior exudes an exotic elegance with decorative woodwork, elegant wooden floor panels, and modern furnishings that create a stylish and sophisticated ambiance.

Wake up to stunning sea views from your private terrace and enjoy a relaxed yet refined holiday experience at Villa Hale Malia.

title: Malaiwana Residences - Duplex
description:
Experience the ultimate Phuket holiday escape with the Malaiwana Residences Duplex. Set within an ultra-exclusive estate offering spectacular views over Naithon Beach, these four-bedroom duplex residences blend modern tropical luxury with an easy island lifestyle.

The chic living and dining areas, complemented by 15-metre private pools and expansive pool decks, provide the perfect setting to unwind. Every room offers blazing sunsets over the Andaman Sea, with sliding glass doors that merge indoor comfort with outdoor tranquility.

Take a short walk or buggy ride to the serene Naithon Beach and enjoy activities such as snorkeling, standup paddling, or savoring fresh seafood. With a dedicated team including a highly skilled Thai chef and a friendly villa manager, your every need is catered to, making it an ideal choice for families and groups seeking both relaxation and inspiration.

title: Villa Nedine
description:
Located just **100 meters from Canggu’s famous Echo Beach**, Villa Nedine is a modern eco-luxury retreat designed for families and groups seeking a stylish coastal escape. With its **spacious 1,512 sqm property**, contemporary design, and partial ocean views, this villa offers the perfect blend of relaxation and entertainment.

The villa features a **12-meter-long swimming pool with a shallow area for kids**, ideal for family vacations. Guests can enjoy a **projector screen for movie nights**, a **chic rooftop garden**, and elegant balconies offering panoramic views. The open-plan living and dining spaces seamlessly blend indoor and outdoor living, creating a bright and airy atmosphere.

Perfect for small **events and celebrations**, Villa Nedine can host up to **30 seated or 50 standing guests**. Whether you're looking to surf at Echo Beach, unwind in a contemporary villa, or celebrate a special occasion, Villa Nedine offers an unforgettable tropical experience.

title: Sansui Niseko Apartment Retreat
description:
Experience modern comfort and style in the Sansui Niseko Apartment Retreat. 

This thoughtfully designed one-bedroom apartment features a spacious, light-filled living area that seamlessly connects to a fully equipped kitchen—perfect for preparing meals or simply unwinding after a day on the slopes. 

A separate, cozy bedroom provides a tranquil sanctuary for restful nights, ensuring that whether you're here for a short getaway or a longer stay, you enjoy all the comforts of home in a refined, alpine setting.

title: Sava Villa 3 - Villa Cielo
description:
Welcome to Sava Villa 3 – an extraordinary beachfront residence where indoor-outdoor living is taken to a new level. The property offers expansive, light-filled living areas that seamlessly flow out onto a 25-metre infinity pool and a pool deck designed for alfresco dining and relaxation.

Step outside to enjoy direct access to the beach and a charming garden gazebo that creates a serene retreat in the tropical setting. Families will appreciate the dedicated kid’s playground, featuring slides, swings, and even a trampoline, all set within a beautifully landscaped back lawn.

With a full team of professional staff including a villa manager, private chef, villa attendants, gardener, and dedicated pool maintenance and security personnel, every detail is managed to ensure your stay is as relaxing as it is luxurious.

title: Villa Saengootsa
description:
Discover Villa Saengootsa – a luxurious five‐bedroom villa perched on a small mountain peninsula just minutes from Patong on Phuket Island. This modern retreat is designed with floor-to-ceiling windows that frame breathtaking views of the majestic Andaman Sea and lush vegetation. The villa’s contemporary aesthetic and geometric design create an atmosphere of tropical minimalism enhanced by colorful artwork and inspiring natural vistas.

Inside, the villa offers a master bedroom and four guest rooms, each with its own ensuite bathroom and secure safety deposit box. Guests can choose from various room configurations featuring king-size or single beds, outdoor bathtubs and jacuzzis, sunbeds, and high-end amenities such as a minibar, premium sound system, and walk-in closets. Soft, inviting bedding and spacious interiors ensure every guest enjoys absolute peace and relaxation while soaking in the endless ocean views.

title: Momiji Lodge Chalet
description:
Experience the refined charm of Momiji Lodge Chalet, a sophisticated mountain retreat nestled in the heart of Niseko's vibrant Hirafu Village.

Spread over three stylish levels, this four-bedroom chalet marries the original character of an early Hirafu lodge with modern comforts—featuring heated floors, double glazing, and individually controlled heating. Classic touches such as wooden floors, skylights, and a traditional Japanese bath blend seamlessly with contemporary amenities to create a warm, inviting atmosphere.

Relax in the sunlit open-plan living area or rejuvenate in the indoor onsen-style granite bath after a day on the slopes. With two master bedrooms offering loft-style accommodations, along with a bunk room and a queen-sized guest room, Momiji Lodge Chalet is ideal for families or groups seeking an authentic yet luxurious alpine experience.
address: Middle Village Hirafu, Niseko, Japan.

title: Niseko Kyo: Luxury Ski-In/Ski-Out Family Retreat with Private Onsens
description: Experience the ultimate alpine getaway at Niseko Kyo, Hirafu Niseko's  only ski in/out property designed exclusively for families and groups of up to 14. Nestled amidst powdery white splendor, this premier retreat features 22 spacious luxury residencies, each elegantly appointed with curated furnishings from renowned brands such as Galotti & Radice, Songdream, and Molteni & C's. Many residencies boast a private in-room onsen—perfect for unwinding after a day on the slopes—while select units offer breathtaking views of Hirafu's Ace Family Run or the majestic Mt. Yotei. Opening ahead of the 23/24 ski season, Niseko Kyo sets a new standard in luxury mountain living.
address: 3-2 Niseko Hirafu 1-jo 4-chome, Kutchan-cho, Abuta-gun, Hokkaido 044-0080

title: Kita Kitsune Chalet
description:
Experience luxury at Kita Kitsune Chalet, where breathtaking views of Mount Yotei and contemporary minimalist design create an unforgettable alpine retreat.

Nestled in the heart of Hirafu, this four-bedroom chalet offers an elegant escape after a day of exploring pristine snowfields and scenic trails. Expansive terraces invite alfresco dining while stylish interiors—with a decorative hanging fireplace and designer furnishings—set the stage for sophisticated relaxation.

Inside, two master bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms complement two additional guest rooms that share a separate bath. The open-plan kitchen beckons you to prepare meals from scratch, while a prime location near top local eateries completes this extraordinary Niseko experience.
address: Hirafu village, Niseko, Japan.

additionalDetails.Spa: Treatments selected from a comprehensive spa menu can be carried out in the chalet by professional beauty therapists (extra cost applies).
additionalDetails.Staff: Greeter upon check-in (8am to 6pm). Additional staff (eg spa therapist and babysitter) available on request for an additional charge.
additionalDetails.Dining: Kita Kitsune Chalet is self-catering. A private chef may be booked in advance for a unique in-house dining experience, or a hamper can be ordered for delivery (upon guest account). Please visit Niseko Gourmet for further information.
additionalDetails.Capacity: 6 people (2 ensuite bedrooms, all with queen-size bed  ; 2 single guest bedrooms with a shared bathroom).
additionalDetails.Fireplace: Please note that the fireplace is not available for use.
additionalDetails.Transport: Kita Kitsune Chalet is centrally located in Hirafu village, a short walk from a wide selection of restaurants, shops and entertainment venues.
additionalDetails.For Families: Kita Kitsune Chalet is an excellent choice for families with children. Fun-filled activities such as tea ceremony demonstrations, sushi making lessons and traditional drumming lessons may be booked in advance.
additionalDetails.Living Areas: Large open-plan lounge, dining and kitchen area; dining table for 8 people; kitchen island with 4 bar stools; decorative hanging fireplace; modern minimalist furniture.
additionalDetails.Entertainment: TV (Satellite/Cable); Apple TV; large selection of books and board games.

Ground floor ensuite master bedroom with queen-size bed
First floor ensuite master bedroom with queen-size bed
Two guest bedrooms, both with queen-size beds, sharing a separate bathroom with bathtub
Fully equipped open-plan kitchen with wide kitchen island and bar stools
Dining table that seats eight people
Windowed walls that provide spectacular views over Mount Yotei and surrounding areas
Flat-screen TV and Apple TV

Should you require a lift to the ski slopes, we can arrange a complimentary shuttle service between 08:00-10:00 and return between 14:00-15:30 daily. Please contact us to secure your seat before 17:00 the day before. In case you change your mind and would like to cancel or reschedule your shuttle, please let us know at least 1 hour prior. Any later cancellations will be subject to a cancellation charge of 3,500 JPY ($23).

Two guest bedrooms, both with queen-size beds, sharing a separate bathroom with bathtub
Sleeps up to 6 guests

title: Seseh Beach Villa I
description:
**Seseh Beach Villa I** is a **luxurious seaside retreat** offering **five spacious bedrooms, a private pool, and direct access to Bali’s serene Seseh Beach**. This **stylish contemporary villa** is part of the **Seseh Beach Villas estate**, which includes a second villa, **providing a total of 11 bedrooms for larger groups and events**.

Designed for **families, wedding parties, and corporate retreats**, Seseh Beach Villa I features **a spacious open-plan living and dining area, high ceilings, and a blend of modern and traditional Balinese design**. The **ocean-facing master suite** provides **breathtaking sunset views**, while the **private infinity pool** and **lush tropical gardens** offer the perfect setting for relaxation.

The villa is serviced by a **dedicated team including a private chef, butlers, and villa attendants**. Guests can enjoy **gourmet dining, beachfront lounging, and tailored experiences**. With **Seseh’s black sand beach just steps away**, and **Canggu’s vibrant cafés, shops, and nightlife within a short drive**, **Seseh Beach Villa I** is **an exceptional choice for those seeking luxury and tranquility**.
address: Seseh village, south-west Bali, Indonesia.

additionalDetails.Spa: In villa treatments selected from a comprehensive spa menu can be carried out by professional beauty therapists (extra cost applies).
additionalDetails.Pool: Two pools measuring 17 x 5 metres and 16 x 7 metres.
additionalDetails.Staff: The staff team includes a villa manager; private chef; assistant cook; villa attendants; security; gardener; maintenance. Additional staff (babysitters, masseuses) available on request.
additionalDetails.Dining: Western, Asian, vegetarian and children’s dishes available. Requests accommodated (including special diets). Grocery cost is charged 30% handling fee which is subject to service and tax at the prevailing rate.
additionalDetails.Capacity: 20 adults and 4 children.
bedrooms: Five king-sized bedrooms (three that may be converted to twins) in Seseh Beach Villa I plus three king-sized bedrooms and two queen-sized bedrooms in Seseh Beach Villa II
Seseh Beach Villa II also has a kids’ bunk room, able to sleep up to four children, located behind the ground floor guestroom
All bedrooms come with air conditioning and ceiling fans, as well as walk-through dressing areas, satellite-channel TVs and DVD players
Ensuite bathrooms are air conditioned, and fitted with rain showers (some of these are outdoor) and bathtubs (except for the bunk room)
additionalDetails.Transport: Car and driver available for 8 hours at a special rate of USD45++/day (excluding petrol).
additionalDetails.For Families: Seseh Beach Villas are well equipped for families. Facilities include a children’s pool ; cutlery and plates; baby cot; high chair; DVDs; toys and pool toys.
additionalDetails.Living Areas: Air conditioned living and dining rooms; outdoor dining pavilions; poolside relaxation balés; terraces; pool decks with sun beds and umbrellas.
additionalDetails.Communication: WiFi internet access; landline for local calls; printer.
additionalDetails.Entertainment: Flat-screen satellite-channel TVs in living rooms and bedrooms; DVD players; iPod docks in each room (Bluetooth or cable through Sonos system); Xbox; PlayStation; Wii.

title: Villa Samira
description:
Perched on a dramatic headland with panoramic ocean views, Villa Samira is a stylish holiday home that promises the ultimate luxury escape. With six spacious bedrooms and a dedicated team of professionals at your service, every detail is designed to impress.

Samira – meaning ‘cool breeze’ – is ideally situated on Phuket’s coveted west coast near Kamala Beach. From its grand entrance framed by steep, Thai-inspired roofs to its modern, sumptuous interiors, every corner of this villa exudes comfort and elegance.

Guests can enjoy sun-kissed afternoons in the 17-metre infinity pool and jacuzzi, a state-of-the-art media room with a projector screen, and even a games room with a pool table. Indulge in restorative treatments in the private spa room or savor delicious Thai cuisine prepared by Samira’s skilled personal chef. The six well-appointed bedrooms ensure complete privacy, with the master suite featuring its own jacuzzi plunge pool, outdoor double bathtub, and a spacious ensuite. Located within a peaceful, secure estate yet only minutes from Phuket’s top leisure and shopping spots, Villa Samira is the perfect retreat for families and groups alike.
address: Kamala Beach, west-coast Phuket, Thailand.

additionalDetails.Spa: Enjoy an authentic Thai massage or other therapeutic treatment in the comfort of the villa’s own spa room.  Spa and beauty specialists can be arranged to attend the villa to administer massages, manicures and other treatments (prices on request).
additionalDetails.Staff: Villa manager; assistant manager; in-villa chef; housekeeping; 24-hour estate security.  Babysitter, masseuse, shopper, car and driver on request (extra charges apply).
additionalDetails.Dining: Complimentary daily breakfast. Mostly Thai and some Western dishes.  Special dietary requirements catered for.  Grocery cost is charged 20% handling fee which is subject to service and tax at the prevailing rate.
additionalDetails.Capacity: 12 people ( 1 king-bedded master suite; 5 guest bedrooms are king-size beds while 3 of which are convertible to twin).  An additional bed may be set up on extra cost.

title: Naam Sawan
description:
Situated within the award-winning Cape Yamu Estate, Naam Sawan is a stunning architectural masterpiece occupying a prime slice of waterfront land on Phuket’s north-east coast. Designed by world-renowned architects Philippe Starck and Jean-Michel Gathy, this luxurious multi-level villa features four to five bedrooms, five bathrooms, and three powder rooms.

Enjoy unparalleled views of Phang Nga Bay with its emerald hills, lush tropical landscapes, and dramatic limestone cliffs. Naam Sawan is perfectly positioned for both seclusion and convenience – just 20 minutes from Phuket International Airport, with easy access to full-service marinas, boating piers, and the exclusive COMO Point Yamu Resort.

Favoured by corporate groups and discerning travelers, this villa offers five-star service with a dedicated team including a villa manager, professional chef, service staff, housekeeping, and 24-hour security. Whether exploring nearby national parks or indulging in the resort’s luxury facilities, Naam Sawan promises an extraordinary seaside experience.
address: Cape Yamu, Phuket, Thailand.

title: Villa Abiente
description:
Villa Abiente offers a chic and intimate retreat on Cape Yamu’s scenic east coast. With modern flair and superb sunrise views, this three-bedroom villa is designed as a stylish hideaway for couples and small groups. The open-plan living area, enhanced by floor-to-ceiling windows, invites abundant natural light and frames stunning views of the sea and surrounding landscape.

Step outside onto the 12-metre infinity pool and sun deck to enjoy panoramic bay views, or relax in the poolside lounge while sipping a refreshing drink. Each of the three bedrooms features a luxurious ensuite bathroom—with two boasting double bathtubs—and the cozy media room offers additional comfort and entertainment.

The interior design is a harmonious mix of white and grey tones with elegant furnishings, while the grand entry hall with its striking mural and Zen rock garden creates a memorable first impression. A dedicated team, including a professional chef and an English-speaking villa manager, ensures impeccable service throughout your stay.
address: Cape Yamu, Phuket, Thailand.

title: Villa Ocean's 11
description:
If you are searching for an intimate yet luxurious retreat in Phuket, Villa Ocean's 11 provides the perfect balance of privacy and accessibility. Strategically located near popular tourist hotspots while maintaining an exclusive, secluded atmosphere, this villa offers breathtaking views of the turquoise ocean and dramatic island formations of Phang Nga Bay.

Featuring six spacious bedroom suites, every room is designed with modern minimalist aesthetics combined with traditional Thai accents – including a pointed Thai-style roof that adds a touch of local charm. Enjoy an outdoor pool, private beach access, a chic bar with indoor and outdoor lounging areas, a well-equipped gym, and a spa room. The expansive living areas, both indoors and out, are perfect for entertaining or simply relaxing while taking in panoramic views.

From the grand entrance with its plush seating and marble Buddha statues to the inviting outdoor pool area, Villa Ocean's 11 promises a refined experience where every detail is meticulously crafted to ensure a memorable stay.
address: 222/11 T.Paklong, Talang, Phuket 83110, Thailand

title: Malaiwana - Villa Rodnaya
description:
Perched on a hillside in the exclusive Malaiwana estate at Naithon Beach, Villa Rodnaya is a modern, bright four-bedroom retreat perfect for families. The villa’s design emphasizes openness and natural light, with sliding glass doors that lead to balconies and a wide top-floor terrace featuring an 18-metre pool.

A transparent safety fence around the pool ensures peace of mind while preserving the spectacular views. The poolside dining sala is ideal for alfresco breakfasts or sunset barbecues, and a dedicated playroom for kids adds to the family-friendly appeal. The open-plan living and dining area under an elegantly curved wooden roof creates an inviting space for gatherings, while the media room offers a cozy retreat for quieter moments.

Every bedroom—including the sumptuous master suite in a poolside pavilion—boasts private bathrooms and stunning sea views. With a dedicated team including a Thai chef and villa manager, Villa Rodnaya is designed to make every stay effortlessly luxurious.
address: Naithon Beach, Thalang, Phuket, Thailand.

title: Malaiwana - Villa M
description:
For those who live for breathtaking sunsets and endless ocean views, Malaiwana Villa M offers an unforgettable experience high on a steep hillside above Naithon Beach. This six-bedroom villa captures the magic of Phuket with a panorama that transforms as the day unfolds—from dazzling blue skies to a cascade of sunset hues reflected in its enormous infinity-edge pool.

Designed for both leisure and luxury, the villa features an expansive pool deck with ample sun loungers, a fully equipped gym, and a stylish bar. The open pavilion dining area, with glass doors that open onto three sides, ensures you never miss a moment of the spectacular view. Every detail, from the sumptuous bedrooms to the state-of-the-art entertainment terrace, is crafted to create a seamless indoor-outdoor living experience.

Ideal for both relaxation and celebration, Malaiwana Villa M is supported by a top-tier team that includes a chef, villa manager, and dedicated staff. Whether you’re enjoying a quiet breakfast or hosting an elegant dinner under a canopy of stars, this villa promises an all-encompassing tropical escape.
address: Naithon Beach, Thalang, Phuket, Thailand.

title: Villa Emerald 5 Bedrooms
description:
Villa Emerald spans two levels and features five sea-view ensuite bedrooms along with two distinct living areas. With a private entrance and dedicated parking available when rented separately from Villa Ruby, this villa is designed to maximize breathtaking views of Koh Mat Lang and the surrounding mountains.

Relax by the infinity-edgeless pool that appears to merge with the sea, while enjoying the elegance of custom-made hardwood furniture and floor-to-ceiling sliding doors that invite abundant natural light. Located in Northern Chaweng within the exclusive Narayan Heights enclave, Villa Emerald offers both privacy and access to nearby fine dining and beach amenities.
address: 80/165, Choeng mon, 84320, Koh Samui, Surat Thani, Thailand

title: Seshu Chalet
description:
Experience mountain living at its finest at Seshu Chalet—a glamorous five-bedroom retreat in the heart of Hirafu Village renowned for its Japanese flair and exceptional hospitality.

Sustainably designed using natural building materials, this stunning chalet spans three floors and exudes a stylish yet cozy ambiance. Two spacious master bedrooms, two identical guest rooms with split king-size beds, and a versatile fifth room that can transform into a traditional tatami space ensure luxurious comfort for every guest.

Gather for meals in the contemporary open-plan kitchen and dining area that seats twelve, or relax on the expansive first-floor terrace—ideal for outdoor barbecues and alfresco dining. With tasteful lighting and a warm fireplace, Seshu Chalet offers the perfect setting for sharing stories of your alpine adventures.
address: Hirafu village, Niseko, Japan.

title: Villa Borimas
description:
Perched on a scenic hillside overlooking the turquoise Andaman Sea, Villa Borimas offers a tranquil and stylish retreat in Phuket. This four-bedroom villa is designed for intimate gatherings, combining luxury with a splash of glamour in every detail.

Step outside to the 10-metre infinity pool and white marble terrace, where you can lounge on sun beds under the shade of a pergola, or enjoy sunset cocktails on the moon deck. Inside, an open-plan living and dining area with floor-to-ceiling glass doors allows natural light and the ocean breeze to fill the space, while the contemporary décor exudes both elegance and comfort.

With professional staff on hand—including a villa manager and an in-house chef—the villa ensures an exceptional stay. Ideally located within Surin Heights Estate and close to some of Phuket’s best beaches and dining spots, Villa Borimas is your gateway to relaxed luxury.
address: Villa Borimas, Surin Heights Estate, Surin Beach, Phuket, Thailand.

title: Malaiwana - Villa Haleana
description:
Set within the exclusive Malaiwana estate overlooking pristine Naithon Beach, Villa Haleana epitomizes modern glamour in a tropical setting. This six-bedroom villa is designed with peak-roofed pavilions inspired by traditional Thai architecture and boasts modern interiors drenched in cool marble and polished wood accents.

The villa offers expansive indoor and outdoor living areas spread over two floors, connected by a lift and staircase. Enjoy your private 18-metre infinity pool, relax in the ultra-luxe spa room and gym, or entertain guests in the stylish dining and lounge areas. Every bedroom is a private sanctuary with glorious sea views and opulent ensuite bathrooms.

With a dedicated team that includes a talented Thai chef and attentive villa manager, Villa Haleana is the perfect retreat for families or groups celebrating a special occasion. Its serene atmosphere and breathtaking vistas make every moment unforgettable.
address: Naithon Beach, Thalang, Phuket, Thailand.

title: Aoyama Lodge Chalet
description:
Discover the modern elegance of Aoyama Lodge Chalet, a sophisticated retreat on the outskirts of Niseko's Hirafu Village.

Enjoy tranquil surroundings and stunning views of Mount Yotei while being just minutes away from premier ski fields and local attractions. Completed in 2019, this contemporary chalet features a refined Japanese design with Birchwood floors, accent walls, and expansive communal living and dining areas.

Large windows frame breathtaking mountain vistas and a raised tatami room—ideal for family dining or a playful children's retreat. Designed to comfortably accommodate up to ten guests, Aoyama Lodge Chalet offers four ensuite bedrooms along with practical amenities such as covered carports and a secure dry room for ski equipment. Begin each day with a complimentary breakfast welcome pack and savor a unique Niseko experience.
address: Hirafu Village, Niseko, Japan.

title: Villa Ruby 4 Bedrooms
description:
Villa Ruby offers a refined and intimate setting with three ensuite bedrooms plus a dedicated children’s/entertainment room with its own bathroom. Rented separately from Villa Emerald, it features a private entrance and parking for added exclusivity.

Enjoy stunning sea views from the infinity-edgeless pool, with picturesque sights of Koh Mat Lang and the surrounding mountains. Located in Northern Chaweng within the prestigious Narayan Heights enclave and just 250 meters from the beach, Villa Ruby provides a stylish yet relaxed atmosphere complete with daily beach shuttles and luxury service.
address: 80/165, Choeng mon, 84320, Koh Samui, Surat Thani, Thailand

title: Casa La Mount Chalet
description:
Embrace the quintessential mountain retreat at Casa La Mount Chalet, ideally located in Annupuri Village. This spacious four-bedroom stone and wood chalet—reminiscent of a traditional Whistler Ski Lodge—blends harmoniously into its natural surroundings while being just 850 meters from the Niseko Annupuri ski lifts.

The classic design is enhanced by sumptuous furnishings, large bedrooms, and elegant modern décor that creates a warm, lived-in atmosphere. An expansive open-plan living area with full-wall gable windows offers stunning panoramic views over the Niseko Valley and Konbu Range, while the designer dining area invites you to savor cozy meals with loved ones.

Perfectly positioned near renowned eateries and modern cafes, Casa La Mount Chalet is an ideal choice for those seeking comfort, style, and convenience in the mountains.
address: Annupuri Village, Niseko, Japan.

title: Villa Amylia 9 Bedrooms
description:
Villa Amylia 9 Bedrooms is comprised of two distinct villas—Villa Emerald and Villa Ruby—that together offer nine luxurious bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. The interiors are a harmonious blend of natural stone, oak accents, and contemporary tropical influences with bright, airy artwork.

Guests can choose to reserve either Villa Amylia Emerald (5 bedrooms) or Villa Amylia Ruby (3 bedrooms plus a children’s/entertainment area), each offering exceptional facilities such as a professional spa room, an exclusive gym with mountain views, and a state-of-the-art home theater. Located in Northern Chaweng within the gated enclave of Narayan Heights, the property provides panoramic sea views and an exclusive rooftop patio for groups booking both villas together.
